name: Space War
description: In this Amiga take on the classic vector game, two ships are controlled by two players, flying around a sun, fighting gravity and trying to blow each other to bits.  Options include variable gravity, a black hole, an extra orbiting moon, toroidal space, and playing across a modem connection.

shot.caption: A Space War battle; don't crash into the sun!
In a tougher game variation, there is a black hole at the center of the screen
